bmeynell--> what about the existing data on it? okay to trash it?
yeah, i can kill everything on it... i have all my important files from windows on my linux partition now
if I merge is all my linux data trashed?
so the question is how to turn the windows partition into linux... is there a simple command or ?
ok cool... i want to keep my linux data and turn my windows partition into a linux partition so to do that I run 'fdisk'
and how will the change affect GRUB?
i don't  believe so.... but i don't know for sure... GRUB runs right after the BIOS runs and lists all my linux installations and my windows boot option at the bottom of the list
it says windows xp is at "root     (hd0,1)"
so I'm good to go? you agree?
